title: Ashes of Time Redux/Dungchesaiduk-2008*(Good English subtitles)
description:
Ashes of Time / Dung che sai duk - Redux-2008*.DvDrip (Good Englsih subtitles)

A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.

Hong Kong filmmaker Wong Kar-Wai directed this lyrical, dream-like martial arts epic.  Its cast features a virtual who's who of the Hong Kong film world. The movie is less a straightforward action thriller than a visually striking meditation on memory and love.  ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“Ashes of Time ReduxÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ is a visual treat of action among swirling sands and beautiful, treacherous landscapes ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ the result is a stirring sensory experience.
